snippet.title: The Dream Machine: Full Game - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The Dream Machine is an award-winning adventure game about dreams and voyeurism. It's built by hand using materials such as clay, cardboard and broccoli.

Trailer music by Ale Speranza: http://oddzounds.com/

TWITTER ► http://twitter.com/theDreamGame
PATREON ► http://www.patreon.com/cockroachinc
FACEBOOK ► https://www.facebook.com/thedreammachinegame
